page.title: 16Attitudes,Earlston
page.content: {Local}Earlston is a small village and it is a nice place to live in. I have lived in Earlston all my life so I have seen some changes. All the time I have been living in Earlston, not many new houses have built.Quite a lot of shops have been closed down and different shops have taken their place. The High School has had a new building added to it which makes it much better. {Incomer}As a newcomer to the area,I have settled in well and made friends.Every summer there is Civic week,with different kinds of entertainment.The school which has been changed recently is quite good.Soon I will be in the High School.Earlston has many basic shops selling lots of things.
